New Records: Moldova secured their first victory in the Nations League with a 2-0 win against Malta.
Ion Nicolaescu scored a penalty goal, contributing to Moldova's win.
Key Match Events: Mihail Caimacov scored a goal from a free kick.
Ion Nicolaescu converted a penalty to secure the victory.
Pre-Game Insights: Moldova was highlighted as a favorite to promote in Division C of the Nations League.
The match was seen as an important step for Moldova in their Nations League campaign.
Post-Match Reflections: The victory was celebrated as a significant achievement for Moldova's national team.
The team's performance was praised for its efficiency and focus.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Zimbru Stadium in Chișinău.
Ukrainian referee Mykola Balakin officiated the game.
Others: Moldova's next fixture is against San Marino on September 10, 2024, also in the Nations League.
